availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tolbert Bowman (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, carpenter and justice of the peace )

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, carpenter and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Bowman. Father of Julia Ann Bowman, Silitha Jane Bowman, Eliza Elizabeth Bowman, and William Baly Bowman. Resident in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1830. Resident in Rockcastle County in 1840. Carpenter in Rockcastle County in 1850. Carpenter in Rockcastle County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Rockcastle County in 1861.

ab.bibl:

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 2, p. 40B.
